name: Eye Contact
description:
Made for Brackeys Game Jam#2

In this game you control two characters where there "love is blind"

which means if they see eachother, they die.

The Goal in each level is to get both characters to the goal without dying.

This was my first game that i have ever finished. Hope you like it!

Controls:

"a + d" To Move.

"w" To Jump.

"Space" To Swap Characters.

"Tab or Escape" To Pause.

"Shift + r" To Restart.
